CDSCurrentDateText: CY-The date of this confirmation statement is:
CDSWhatIsDetailExpanderTitle: CY-What is the confirmation statement date?
CDSCurrentDateExplainer: CY-It's the date the limited partnership information is made up to. It's 12 months after the last confirmation statement, or 12 months after the limited partnership's registration date.
CDSDateChangeExplainer: CY-If you change the date of the confirmation statement, this will change the date of future confirmation statements.
CDSNotDueToFileEarly: CY-You are not due to file a confirmation statement yet.
CDSExpectedFileDateTextEarly: CY-The date of your next expected confirmation statement is
CDSDateChangeExplainerStartEarly: CY-If you file a confirmation statement today, the confirmation statement date will change to
CDSDateChangeExplainerEndEarly: CY-, or you can choose another date.
CDSDateChangeExplainer2Early: CY-This will start a new 12 month review period and change the date of future confirmation statements.
CDSRadioButtonNoTextEarly: CY-No, I want to use today's date -
CDSErrorNoRadioSelected: CY-Tell us if you want to change the date of this confirmation statement
CDSErrorDateNoData: CY-Enter the new confirmation statement date
CDSErrorDateNoDay: CY-Confirmation statement date must include a day
CDSErrorDateNoMonth: CY-Confirmation statement date must include a month
CDSErrorDateNoYear: CY-Confirmation statement date must include a year
CDSErrorDateWrong: CY-Confirmation statement date must be a real date
CDSErrorPastDate: CY-Confirmation statement date must be today or in the past
CDSErrorSameCsDate: CY-A confirmation statement has already been filed for the date youâ€™ve entered
CDSErrorCsDateAfterlastCsDate: CY-The date you enter must be after the date of the last confirmation statement
CDSDateValueInvalidError: CY-Error: The confirmation statement date is invalid
CDSRadioButtonQuestion: CY-Do you want to change the date of this confirmation statement?
CDSRadioButtonYesExplainer: CY-Enter the new confirmation statement date
CDSRadioButtonYesExplainerExample: CY-For example, 30 9 2025. You cannot enter a date in the future.
